medical_history.chief_complaint: Unusual manifestation of immune reconstitution inflammatory syndrome (IRIS) leading to Sweet syndrome.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began in context of recent ART, with early redistribution of CD41 lymphocytes leading to localized skin activity. Symptoms progressed without acute infection or malignancy, resolving without changes to ART.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of ART usage; previous diagnosis of hypersensitivity syndrome related to carbamazepine in 1989.
medical_history.family_history: Brother with a history of Hodgkin lymphoma.
